# isTabBarVisible

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the tabbed window group currently displays a tab bar.

## Declaration

```swift
var isTabBarVisible: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

Typically, a tabbed window displays a tab bar if there is more than one window in the tabbing group. The tab bar can also be manually toggled using the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/toggleTabBar(_:)] method.

## Configuring the Tab User Interface

- **isOverviewVisible**: A Boolean value indicating if the tab overview is currently displayed.
